INSERT INTO TB_HIRE ( H_IDX, TITLE, URL, COMPANY, SALES, DIVISION, BUSINESS, HOWEVER, AREA, ADDRESS, FILECLASS, DUTY, PERSONNEL, TASK, APPLY, EDUCATION, CAREER, EMPLOY, WORK, CERTIFICATE, SALARY, WORKPLACE, PREFERENTIAL, S_DATE, E_DATE, WURL, SURL, USE_YN, CONTENT, REG_NAME, REG_DATE, REG_ID ) VALUES ((SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CONVERT(H_IDX, UNSIGNED)), 0)+1 AS H_IDX FROM TB_HIRE B), #{title}, #{url}, #{company}, #{sales}, #{division}, #{business}, #{however}, #{area}, #{address}, #{fileclass}, #{duty}, #{personnel}, #{task}, #{apply}, #{education}, #{career}, #{employ}, #{work}, #{certificate}, #{salary}, #{workplace}, #{preferential}, #{sDate}, #{eDate}, #{wurl}, #{surl}, 'Y', #{content}, #{regName}, now(), #{session.id} )

mapper.update: UPDATE TB_HIRE SET TITLE=#{title}, URL=#{url}, COMPANY=#{company}, SALES=#{sales}, DIVISION=#{division}, BUSINESS=#{business}, HOWEVER=#{however}, AREA=#{area}, ADDRESS=#{address}, FILECLASS=#{fileclass}, DUTY=#{duty}, PERSONNEL=#{personnel}, TASK=#{task}, APPLY=#{apply}, EDUCATION=#{education}, CAREER=#{career}, EMPLOY=#{employ}, WORK=#{work}, CERTIFICATE=#{certificate}, SALARY=#{salary}, WORKPLACE=#{workplace}, PREFERENTIAL=#{preferential}, S_DATE=#{sDate}, E_DATE=#{eDate}, CONTENT=#{content}, WURL=#{wurl}, SURL=#{surl} WHERE H_IDX = #{hIdx}
UPDATE TB_HIRE SET HIT = HIT + 1, MOD_ID = #{session.id}, MOD_NAME = #{session.name}, MOD_DATE = now(), MOD_IP = #{remoteAddr} WHERE H_IDX = #{hIdx}
